title: Let’s admire Lidl-Trek’s stunning paintjobs: Tour de France Femmes bike gallery
content:
Cyclist
Let’s admire Lidl-Trek’s stunning paintjobs: Tour de France Femmes bike gallery

Lidl-Trek are one of the super-teams of the Tour de France Femmes. Featuring big names riders including Elisa Longo Borghini, Lizzie Deignan and Elisa Balsamo, they’re competing for the win every day and with their new kit it’s hard to miss them.

That’s not all though, they also all have brand new Project One paint jobs that are absolutely stunning – let us know in the comments which is your favourite. Is it Lizzie Deignan’s ‘Elsa’ Frozen tribute or does Elisa Balsamo’s iridescent Madone set the benchmark for all former World Champions?

On a mixture of Trek Madone and Émonda bikes, Lidl-Trek are also kitted out with SRAM Red eTap AXS groupsets, Bontrager Aeolus wheels, cockpit and saddle, Pirelli tyres, Time pedals, Kogel bearings and bolts and Wahoo computers.

Keep scrolling for pictures of all the Lidl-Trek team bikes and Elisa Longo Borghini’s full bike spec.

Elisa Longo Borghini’s Trek Madone spec

FramesetTrek Madone
ColourChroma Diamond Flake P1
GroupsetSRAM Red eTap AXS
BrakesSRAM Red Disc, 160mm front/140mm rear rotors
CranksetSRAM Red w/ Quarq power meter 52/39
CassetteSRAM Red 10-33
ChainSRAM Red Flattop
WheelsBontrager Aeolus RSL 51
PedalsTime XPRO 12
BearingsKogel Ceramic
BoltsKogel Titanium Anodised
TyresPirelli P Zero TLR 28mm
CockpitBontrager RSL one-piece, 120mm length, -7° tilt, 38mm width
SaddleBontrager Aeolus 145
ComputerWahoo
Measurements
Frame size52
Rider height1.7m
Rider weight59kg
